import Mathlib

open Set

variable {n : Nat}

/-- Let U âŠ‚ â„^n be open and f : U â†’ â„ be differentiable. If f is convex on U, then for all x,y âˆˆ U and t âˆˆ [0,1],
    f (t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t * f x + (1 - t) * f y. -/
theorem convex_on_implies_convex_combination {U : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)} {f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„}
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hd : DifferentiableOn â„ f U) (hconv : ConvexOn â„ U f) :
  âˆ€ x y âˆˆ U, âˆ€ t âˆˆ Icc (0 : â„) 1, f (t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t * f x + (1 - t) * f y := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Set

variable {n : Nat}

/-- Let U âŠ‚ â„^n be open and f : U â†’ â„ be differentiable. If f is convex on U, then for all x,y âˆˆ U and t âˆˆ [0,1],
    f (t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t * f x + (1 - t) * f y. -/
theorem convex_on_implies_convex_combination {U : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)} {f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„}
  (hU : IsOpen U) (hd : DifferentiableOn â„ f U) (hconv : ConvexOn â„ U f) :
  âˆ€ x y (hx : x âˆˆ U) (hy : y âˆˆ U) (t : â„) (ht : t âˆˆ Icc (0 : â„) 1),
    f (t â€¢ x + (1 - t) â€¢ y) â‰¤ t * f x + (1 - t) * f y := by sorry
